description: This file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to events, including create/update requests and response shapes, used in event planning application.

classes.name: CreateEventRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating or updating an event, including fields like Title, Description, StartUtc, EndUtc, Timezone, Location, and Capacity.

classes.name: UpdateEventRequest
classes.description: Inherits from CreateEventRequest, used for updating an event.

classes.name: EventResponse
classes.description: DTO for responding with event details, including Id, Title, Description, StartUtc, EndUtc, Timezone, Location, Capacity, and OwnerUserId.
